content: this is snowflake #26 in the book of 100 snowflakes instructions are on page 56 pictured on page 26 in showcase a cold northwest wind in central france shares its name with this wispy and elegant crystal finished diameter 3-1/4 in 83 mm thread required 7 yd 6 4 m all pattern samples in this book are made with size 10 thread and a size 5 1 9 mm crochet hook this pattern is one of 10 featured from the book on lion brand s website lion brand recommends lion brand bonbons cotton yarn with a 3 5 mm e hook or 3 75 mm f hook
